description:
With Kokuoh gone and his mobility cut off, Raoh sends Zaku`s squad at Kenshiro to try to stop him as well.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fudo in Peril! Hurry, Ken, A Man Must Not Abandon His Friends!!
Un grand danger menace Fudo ! Ken, un homme n`abandonne jamais ses amis !!
フドウ絶体絶命! 急げケン, 男は友を見すてない!!
